description: Create a project transport plan trailer summary.
permissions: Authenticated user with a persisted account (policy allows create for signed-in users).
validation_notes: Defaults to grouping by trailer when --group-by is not set. If no metrics are specified via --metrics/--metric and --all-metrics is false, metrics default to count and trailer_assignment_prediction_correct_pct. --filters must be valid JSON object; --filter entries must be key=value with a non-empty key. Available group-by attributes: broker, customer, has_trailer_prediction_position, is_managed, ordered_date, pickup_date, project_category, project_division, project_office, trailer, transport_order_status, was_unmanaged. Available filters: broker, customer, trailer, is_managed, was_unmanaged, has_trailer_prediction_position, ordered_date, ordered_date_min, ordered_date_max, pickup_date, pickup_date_min, pickup_date_max, project_division, project_office, project_category, transport_order_status, transport_order. Server parses ordered_date/pickup_date and *_min/_max as date inputs; trailer and transport_order as integers; is_managed/was_unmanaged/has_trailer_prediction_position as booleans; transport_order_status as string input.

flags.name: --all-metrics
flags.description: Include all metrics returned by the API

flags.name: --filter
flags.validation: Each entry must be key=value with a non-empty key (e.g., broker=123).

flags.name: --group-by
flags.description: Group by attributes (comma-separated). Defaults to trailer unless set.
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of group-by attributes; available values listed in help.

flags.name: --metric
flags.validation: Must be one of the available metric names (see help for list).

flags.name: --metrics
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of metric names (see help for list).
